page.title: 03WESTON FARM
page.content: A farm of over 500 acres stretching northwards from Butser Hill parallel to the A3 road and railway line {Crops & Livestock:}200 acres of wheat are grown, the rest of the farm is grass. There are 300 Friesian cows 150 of which are being milked. { {Mechanisation:}5 farm workers, 5 tractors with a wide range of implements and 1 combine harvester are based at the farm. {Social Concern: Part of the farm buildings on the south side of Weston Lane are ancient and are covered by a preservation order. The owners have applied for planning permission to turn the barns into 2 residential buildings with outhouses, but local opinion is against this. These barns were designed for the horse and cart era and ceilings are too low to allow tractors inside.
